description.name: SK5 32cm saw with a hook
description.long_desc:
This gardening saw with a hook is designed for precise and safe cutting of wood, branches, and shrubs. It features an ergonomic, contoured plastic handle that ensures a secure grip and high comfort even during extended use. The curved blade made of SK5 steel performs exceptionally well on both dry and fresh wood.


Technical Specifications:




  • Working Blade Length: 320 mm (32 cm)




  • Blade Material: SK5 Steel




  • Blade Hardness: 55–60 HRC




  • Blade Type: Curved with hook




  • Handle: Ergonomic, non-slip




  • Applications: Cutting branches, wood, and shrubs




Advantages and Features:




  • Precision Cutting: Hardened teeth ensure efficient cutting in both directions




  • Durability and Sharpness: SK5 steel with a hardness of 55–60 HRC offers long-lasting edge retention and toughness




  • Work Safety: The special hook stabilizes the blade on branches and prevents slipping during use




  • Comfortable Grip: Contoured handle with non-slip finish fits the hand perfectly and minimizes fatigue




  • Versatile Use: Ideal for trimming shrubs, branches, and garden wood

description.name: SK5 32cm saw with a hook for a handle
description.long_desc:
Crafted from high-quality SK5 steel, this saw is perfect for both gardening and forestry tasks. Its curved blade, ending in a hook, ensures precise and safe cutting while preventing slippage from branches during elevated work.


Advantages and Features:




  • Precision Cutting: Specially shaped teeth provide effective cutting in both directions.




  • Durability and Resistance: SK5 steel is renowned for its wear resistance and excellent cutting properties.




  • Work Safety: The hook stabilizes the saw during branch cutting and prevents uncontrolled slipping.




  • Expandability: Equipped with a socket for a handle, making it ideal for use with long poles – useful for trimming higher tree sections.




Key Product Features:




  • Working Blade Length: 320 mm (32 cm)




  • Blade Type: Hardened high-carbon SK5 steel (hardness: 55–60 HRC)




  • Blade Tip: Practical hook for grabbing and holding branches




  • Mounting: Designed for attachment to a wooden handle




  • Construction: Durable blade connection with a metal grip (2 mounting screws)




  • Applications: Cutting branches, garden wood, shrubs – ideal for elevated work




Technical Specifications:


Blade Length: 320 mm (32 cm)


Blade Material: SK5 Steel


Blade Hardness: 55–60 HRC


Mounting Type: For wooden handle


Tip: Hook for grabbing

description.name: 65Mn 35cm PTFE coated curved blade saw with a holster
description.long_desc:
This premium hand saw with a 35 cm curved blade made from 65Mn spring steel is an essential tool for trimming branches, shrubs, and garden wood. Designed for comfort, precision, and durability, it is ideal for both professionals and home users. The saw features an ergonomic, non-slip handle that fits perfectly in the hand.


Key Product Features:




  • Blade Length: 35 cm (350 mm)




  • Blade Material: Hardened 65Mn spring steel




  • Blade Hardness: 50–54 HRC – high abrasion resistance




  • Cutting Teeth: 7 TPI (teeth per inch) – optimized for cutting performance




  • PTFE Coating: Black, anti-corrosion, low-friction surface for smooth and easy cutting




  • Handle: Ergonomic, non-slip grip with lanyard hole




  • Protective Sheath: Rigid holster with belt clip – safe and convenient for transport




Why Choose This Saw?




  • Curved Blade: Offers improved control and smoother guiding through the material




  • PTFE Coating: Protects the blade from moisture and resin, extending its service life




  • High Cutting Precision: Thanks to dense tooth spacing and impulse-hardened edges




  • User Comfort: Contoured handle fits the hand perfectly for fatigue-free operation




  • Field Convenience: Sheath with clip enables quick attachment to a belt – ideal for outdoor work




Technical Specifications:


Blade Length: 350 mm


Blade Hardness: 50–54 HRC


Blade Material: 65Mn Steel


Protective Coating: PTFE (black, anti-corrosive)


Tooth Configuration: 7 TPI


Blade Type: Curved


Handle: Ergonomic, non-slip


Sheath: Included, with belt clip

12V/230V diesel air heater 8KW
description.long_desc:
Car Heater / Diesel Parking Heater 230V/12V 8kW with Integrated Fuel Tank


We present the 8kW parking heater, designed to provide maximum thermal comfort on every journey. With an integrated fuel tank and modern design, the device is not only efficient but also convenient for transport and installation. The heater features a control panel that allows precise adjustment of operating parameters, as well as a remote control, ensuring ease of use without the need for direct access to the device.


Powered by EN590 compliant diesel fuel, this high-powered heater is the ideal solution for heating cabin spaces in vehicles, boats, camper trailers, or agricultural machinery. Its efficiency, providing up to 55 m3/h of hot air flow, and low CO2 emissions make it an excellent choice for use in harsh weather and terrain conditions.


Key Product Advantages:




  • Powerful Heating Capacity of 8kW – Perfect for large spaces, ensuring quick and efficient heating.




  • Integrated Fuel Tank – Increases the convenience of installation and use, minimizing the need for additional fuel containers.




  • Easy-to-Use Control Panel – An intuitive display and clear buttons make it easy to adjust settings.




  • Remote Control – Enables full control of the device without the need to leave the vehicle.




  • Economical Fuel Consumption – Between 0.35 to 0.78 L/hour, allowing extended use without frequent refueling.




  • Sturdy Construction – Durable housing and compact size ensure reliability even in extreme conditions.




Application Scope of the Heater:




  • All Types of Motor Vehicles – Ideal for passenger cars, trucks, vans, and off-road vehicles.




  • Construction and Agricultural Machinery – Provides comfortable temperature in work cabins during winter fieldwork.




  • Boats, Yachts, and Ships – Effectively heats cabins and living spaces on vessels.




  • Camper Vans – Provides warm, comfortable conditions during outdoor recreation, even in cold climates.




Permitted Uses:




  • Defrosting Windows – Facilitates rapid defrosting, improving visibility.




  • Heating Driver Cabins, Cargo Areas, and Providing Thermal Comfort – Suitable for camper trailers and yachts.




Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply Voltage: 230V / 12V

  • Fuel: Diesel compliant with EN590

  • Heating Power: 8 kW

  • Hot Air Flow: 55 m3/h

  • Fuel Consumption: 0.35 - 0.78 L/hour

  • Power Consumption: 20-45 W

  • Operating/Storage Temperature: -30? to 55?

  • Operating Altitude: Up to 4300 m above sea level

  • CO2 Emissions: <10%

  • Heater Dimensions: 25 x 37 x 26.5 cm

  • Heater Weight: 7.0 kg

  • Weight with Accessories: 7.5 kg


The Set Includes:



  • Air heater with integrated fuel tank

  • Remote control

  • Compact control panel

  • All necessary mounting accessories, including hoses, clamps, and fasteners


The Car Heater / Parking Heater 230V/12V 8kW with Integrated Fuel Tank is a powerful device that provides thermal comfort wherever you need it. It is the ideal solution for heating motor vehicles, construction machinery, vessels, and camper vans. With 8kW of power, a built-in fuel tank, and intuitive controls, it is an indispensable piece of equipment for anyone who values comfort and thermal independence, even in the toughest conditions.

Wide gardening spade
description.long_desc:
The wide gardening trowel is designed with comfort and durability in mind.
Its sturdy 9 cm wide blade allows for quick and precise soil work – perfect for planting, transplanting bulbs, or loosening the soil.


Technical specifications:




  • Total length: 32 cm




  • Blade dimensions: 9 x 15.5 cm




  • Material: powder-coated steel




  • Handle: ergonomic, non-slip, with a hanging hole




Durability for years


The powder coating enhances resistance to corrosion and wear. The smooth surface makes cleaning the tool after use easy.


Ergonomics and safety


The contoured non-slip handle made of soft material ensures a secure grip and maximum comfort, even during extended gardening sessions. An additional hole in the handle allows for convenient storage – hang it where it’ll always be within reach!

Durability for years


The powder coating enhances resistance to corrosion and wear. The smooth surface makes cleaning the tool after use easy.


Ergonomics and safety


The contoured non-slip handle made of soft material ensures a secure grip and maximum comfort, even during extended gardening sessions. An additional hole in the handle allows for convenient storage – hang it where it’ll always be within reach!

description.name: Gardening cultivator
description.long_desc:
The three-pronged garden cultivator is perfect for loosening, aerating, weeding, and preparing soil for planting.
Thanks to its 5.5 cm tine spacing, the tool performs well in both light and more compacted soil.


Technical specifications:



  • Total length: 34 cm

  • Tine length: 4.5 cm

  • Tine spacing: 5.5 cm

  • Material: powder-coated steel

  • Handle: ergonomic, non-slip, with a hanging hole


Durability and quality craftsmanship


The tines are made of durable powder-coated steel, ensuring resistance to corrosion and long-lasting performance. The tips are cone-shaped to penetrate the soil more easily.


Comfort and ease of use


The ergonomic, non-slip handle offers a secure and comfortable grip, even during extended periods of work. An additional hole in the handle allows for easy hanging and convenient storage.

description.name: Gardening rakes
description.long_desc:
Handy garden rake with 5 tines – an essential tool for maintaining flower beds, garden plots, and containers.
Thanks to its ergonomic, non-slip handle and powder-coated steel construction, it offers both comfort and durability for everyday gardening tasks.


Technical specifications:



  • Total length: 27 cm

  • Working width: 8.5 cm

  • Tine length: 5.5 cm

  • Number of tines: 5

  • Handle: ergonomic, non-slip, with a hanging hole

  • Material: powder-coated steel


Ideal for maintaining garden beds and borders


The garden rake is a practical tool, perfect for:



  • loosening and leveling soil,

  • removing weeds,

  • preparing soil for planting,


Working in planters and containers


With 5 sturdy tines, each 5.5 cm long and a working width of 8.5 cm, this tool allows for precise and efficient work even in hard-to-reach areas.


Durable and functional design


Made from tough, powder-coated steel, the rake offers excellent resistance to corrosion and mechanical damage. Long-lasting and easy to clean – a reliable addition to your gardening toolkit.


Comfort and ease of use


The ergonomic handle, coated with non-slip material, fits comfortably in the hand and doesn’t slip during use. A hole in the handle allows the tool to be hung up – always within reach, ready to go.

description.name: Gardening fan rakes
description.long_desc:
Fan-shaped hand rake – the perfect tool for gathering leaves, mulch, grass clippings, and small garden debris.
With a narrow working width and 9 flexible tines, it’s ideal for use in tight spaces such as between plants, in flower beds, and in pots.


Technical specifications:




  • Total tool length: 36 cm




  • Working width: 13 cm




  • Number of tines: 9




  • Material: powder-coated steel




  • Handle: ergonomic, non-slip, with a hanging hole




Built to last


The tines are made of durable steel and coated with a protective powder finish, ensuring resistance to weather conditions and abrasion. Their lightweight design allows for quick and easy maneuvering without straining the hands.


Comfort and ease of use


The ergonomically shaped, non-slip handle fits comfortably in the hand, reducing fatigue during longer gardening sessions. The handle includes a hole for convenient hanging in a garage or on a garden shed wall.


Why choose this tool?



  • Lightweight and easy-to-handle design

  • Perfect for small garden spaces

  • 9 flexible tines for effective raking

  • Ergonomic handle for maximum comfort

  • Suitable for both beginners and experienced gardeners

description.name: Gardening weed cutter
description.long_desc:
Garden Weeder – a tool designed for efficient removal of weeds along with their root systems, even in hard-to-reach areas. The long, narrow blade with a forked tip allows for precise lifting of roots without disturbing surrounding plants.


Technical specifications:




  • Total length: 34 cm




  • Blade length: 19 cm




  • Working width: 5 cm




  • Blade material: powder-coated steel




  • Handle: ergonomic, non-slip, with a hanging hole




Durable and resistant construction


Made from robust powder-coated steel, the weeder offers excellent resistance to corrosion, moisture, and mechanical damage – a tool that will serve you well for many gardening seasons.


User comfort


The ergonomic, non-slip handle ensures a stable and comfortable grip, even when working in damp conditions. A hole at the end of the handle allows for easy hanging and convenient storage.


Key benefits:




  • Effectively removes weeds with roots




  • Long, narrow blade for precise work




  • Powder-coated steel – durable and rust-resistant




  • Comfortable handle with soft, non-slip finish




  • Lightweight, easy-to-use design – perfect for gardens and allotments




Get rid of stubborn weeds quickly, efficiently, and effortlessly – choose a professional garden tool you can rely on!

description.name: 9pcs stud cleaner set
description.long_desc:
Professional Set for Cleaning Car Wheel Bolts and Studs


A professional kit designed for cleaning automotive wheel bolts and studs is an essential tool for mechanics, tire service technicians, and anyone who values safety and quality in wheel mounting. Compact, durable, and compatible with various drive systems – this set is the ideal choice for quickly and effectively removing rust, dirt, and old grease from bolt and stud surfaces.


Key Features:




  • 9-piece set in a practical carrying case




  • 6 interchangeable brushes of various diameters (suitable for most bolts and studs)




  • Brush holder with 1/2" drive




  • Two adapters: for power drill (HEX 1/2") and for hammer drills with SDS-PLUS chuck (1/2")




  • Quick-change system for fast and secure brush replacement




Set Contents:




  • 1× brush holder (1/2" drive)




  • 6× cleaning brushes:




    • 12 mm (7/16")




    • 13 mm (1/2")




    • 14 mm (9/16")




    • 16 mm (5/8")




    • 22 mm (7/8")




    • 28 mm (1-1/8")






  • 1× SDS-PLUS adapter (1/2")




  • 1× HEX adapter (1/2")




  • 1× durable carrying case




Applications:




  • Cleaning threads, bolts, and studs




  • Preparing mount points before installing aluminum or steel wheels




  • Enhancing service work efficiency and safety




Why Choose This Kit?




  • Versatility – compatible with multiple drive systems




  • Durable materials – robust cleaning fibers in a resilient casing




  • Clean and mobile – convenient case for storage and transport




  • Ergonomic and easy to use – intuitive brush replacement system

description.name: 5.7m snow roof rake (61,5x14cm)
description.long_desc:
The Roof Snow Rake with a Working Length of 5.7 m is an indispensable tool for safely and effectively removing snow from rooftops, solar panel installations, and more. Thanks to its modular design and durable materials, it allows for quick clearing of even hard-to-reach surfaces without the need to climb onto the roof.


Product Features:



  • Modular Design: Composed of segments that easily adjust the length up to 5.7 m, allowing for comfortable and safe use from ground level.

  • Working Width: 61 cm – a wide working surface enables quick and efficient snow removal.

  • Blade Material: Durable plastic resistant to damage and cracking, ideal for low-temperature use.

  • Handle: Made from high-quality aluminum, ensuring the tool is lightweight yet durable.

  • D-Shaped Handle: Ergonomic grip for a secure hold and comfortable maneuvering.

  • Easy to Use: Intuitive assembly and disassembly of modules make it quick to adjust the tool's length to individual needs.


Advantages:



  • Safe snow removal without the need to climb onto the roof.

  • Lightweight yet sturdy construction for easy handling.

  • Wide working surface speeds up the clearing process.

  • Resistant to low temperatures and harsh weather conditions.

  • Compact when disassembled, making it easy to store.


Applications:



  • Removing snow from the roofs of houses, garages, gazebos, and other buildings.

  • Cleaning canopies, shelters, and solar panels.

  • Ideal for property owners, building managers, and companies responsible for winter maintenance.

  • Lightweight yet sturdy design for easy maneuvering.

  • Wide working surface speeds up the snow-clearing process.

  • Resistant to low temperatures and harsh weather conditions.

  • Compact when disassembled for easy storage.


Applications:



  • Removing snow from the roofs of houses, garages, gazebos, and other structures.

  • Cleaning canopies, shelters, and solar panels.

  • Ideal for property owners, building managers, and companies responsible for winter maintenance.
description.description:
The Roof Snow Rake with a Working Length of 7.5 m is an essential tool for safely and effectively removing snow from rooftops, solar panel installations, and more. Its modular design and durable materials allow for quick clearing of even hard-to-reach surfaces without the need to climb onto the roof.


Product Features:



  • Modular Design: Composed of segments that easily adjust the length up to 7.5 m, enabling comfortable and safe operation from ground level.

  • Working Width: 61 cm – a wide working surface ensures fast and efficient snow removal.

  • Blade Material: Durable plastic resistant to damage and cracking, ideal for low-temperature conditions.

  • Handle: Made of high-quality aluminum for a lightweight and durable build.

  • D-Shaped Handle: Ergonomic grip provides a secure hold and comfortable handling.

  • Easy to Use: Intuitive assembly and disassembly of modules allow quick adjustment of the tool's length to individual needs.


Advantages:



  • Safe snow removal without climbing onto the roof.

  • Lightweight yet sturdy design for easy maneuvering.

  • Wide working surface speeds up the snow-clearing process.

  • Resistant to low temperatures and harsh weather conditions.

  • Compact when disassembled for easy storage.


Applications:



  • Removing snow from the roofs of houses, garages, gazebos, and other structures.

  • Cleaning canopies, shelters, and solar panels.

  • Ideal for property owners, building managers, and companies responsible for winter maintenance.

description.name: 108pcs socket set (1/4" & 1/2")
description.long_desc:
Socket Wrench Set 108 pcs 1/4" & 1/2" CRV


A 108-piece socket and accessory set that meets the expectations of both DIY enthusiasts and professional mechanics. Made of high-quality chrome vanadium (CrV) tool steel, it ensures longevity and resistance to mechanical damage.


Product Features:




  • Durability and Quality – Tools made from CrV steel provide exceptional strength and corrosion resistance.




  • Work Ergonomics – Ratchets are equipped with ergonomic, non-slip handles for comfortable and secure grip during work.




  • Comprehensive Set of Bits and Sockets – Everything you need for a wide range of repair, assembly, and service tasks.




  • Practical Case – A sturdy, lockable case with designated slots for each component makes transportation and storage easy.




Set Contents:


Ratchets:




  • 1/4" Ratchet




  • 1/2" Ratchet




1/4" Sockets:




  • Standard: 4 – 14 mm




  • E-type: E4 – E8




  • Long: 6 – 13 mm




1/2" Sockets:




  • Standard: 10 – 32 mm




  • E-type: E10 – E24




  • Long: 14 – 22 mm




Spark Plug Sockets:




  • 16 mm, 21 mm




Additional Components:




  • Sliding T-handle 1/4" and 1/2"




  • Extensions: 1/4" (2", 4"), 1/2" (5", 10")




  • Universal Joints (Cardan Joints): 1/4", 1/2"




  • 1/4" Screwdriver Handle 6"




  • 1/2" Bit Holder




Bits:




  • 1/4": SL4-6, PH1-2, PZ1-2, H3-6, T8-30




  • 8 mm: SL8-12, PH3-4, PZ3-4, H7-14, T40-60




Hex Keys (Allen Keys):




  • 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 mm

description.long_desc:
216-Piece Socket Wrench Set 1/4", 3/8", 1/2" CRV


A comprehensive 216-piece set of sockets, combination wrenches, and accessories that meets the needs of both home DIYers and professional mechanics. Made from high-quality chrome vanadium (CrV) tool steel, it ensures durability and resistance to mechanical damage.


Product Features:




  • CrV Tool Steel (Chrome Vanadium) – Resistant to corrosion, impact, and heavy-duty use.




  • Three Drive Sizes (1/4", 3/8", 1/2") – Allow for optimal power and precision for various tasks.




  • Ergonomic Ratchets with Non-Slip Grips – Ensure comfortable and safe work, even over extended periods.




  • Comprehensive Equipment – Includes standard sockets, E-type sockets, and a wide selection of specialty bits.




  • Sturdy Case with Dedicated Slots – Keeps tools organized and portable.




Set Contents (216 pieces):


Ratchets:




  • 1/4"




  • 3/8"




  • 1/2"




Sockets:

  • 3/8": 10–19 mm

  • 1/4": E4–E8




  • 3/8": E10–E18




  • 1/2": E20–E24




Long Sockets:




  • 1/4": 4–10 mm

  • 1/2": 16–22 mm

  • 1/2": T55, T60




  • 8 mm: H5–12, SL6–8, PH3–4, PZ3–4, T27–50, TT27–50, M5–10




  • 6.35 mm (1/4"): M5–12, PH0–3, PZ0–3, SL4–7, H2–7, SP4–10, TW1–4, TT8–45, DO6–10




Spark Plug Sockets:




  • 3/8": 16 mm




  • 1/2": 16 mm, 21 mm

  • 8–19 mm (12 pieces)




Additional Accessories:




  • Sliding T-Handles: 1/4", 1/2"




  • Extensions:




    • 1/4" (2", 4")

  • Hex Keys (Allen Keys): 1.27–5 mm

description.name: Green target card with a magnet
description.long_desc:
A professional laser target plate is a practical tool that enhances comfort and accuracy when working with cross-line lasers—especially during finishing work, suspended ceiling installations, and alignment of metal structures. The green color provides high contrast with the green laser beam, improving line visibility even in challenging lighting conditions.


Product Features:




  • Enhanced laser visibility – the special green surface makes the laser beam more visible.




  • Dual magnets – two strong magnets located at the top of the plate allow quick and stable attachment to metal profiles, rails, or other steel surfaces.




  • Measurement scales – marked in both centimeters (cm) and inches (inch) for precise alignment and laser point reading.




  • Sight window with printed crosshair – helps in accurate targeting of the laser beam.




  • Compact size – 70 × 100 mm – easy to store and carry.




Applications:




  • Installation and leveling of suspended ceilings




  • Positioning of metal structures and drywall systems




  • Supporting work with laser levels




  • Construction, interior finishing, and technical installations




Technical Specifications:




  • Dimensions: 70 × 100 mm




  • Color: Green




  • Material: Durable ABS




  • Magnets: 2 × ferrite magnets (top section)




  • Scale: cm + inch

description.name: Vacuum pump for vacuum cups
description.long_desc:
Turn a classic manual suction cup into a modern, battery-powered vacuum suction cup!
With this practical pump, you can enjoy greater comfort and efficiency when handling glass, tiles, and other smooth-surfaced materials. A perfect solution for professionals, installers, and anyone who values convenience and reliability.


Key Features:




  • Universal conversion – Easily transforms traditional manual suction cups into an automatic version (with a battery-powered pump).




  • Built-in battery – Internal power source offers full mobility without needing manual pumping.




  • USB-C charging – Modern connector, fast charging, USB-C cable included.




  • Compatibility – Fits all GEKO and Tvardy vacuum suction cups.




  • 28 mm mounting diameter – Also compatible with other brands that use the same mount size.




  • Quiet and efficient operation – Low noise level, high vacuum suction efficiency.




Set Includes:




  • Battery-powered vacuum pump




  • USB-C charging cable




Technical Specifications:




  • Power supply: Built-in rechargeable battery




  • Charging: USB-C (cable included)




  • Compatibility: GEKO, Tvardy, others with 28 mm socket




  • Mounting diameter: 28 mm (inner)




  • Application: Vacuum suction cups for glass and tiles




  • Color: Black with white body




  • Material: Plastic (ABS + PVC)




Applications:




  • Transport and installation of glass, furniture boards, panels, windows




  • Carpentry, glazing, and construction work




  • Anywhere a secure grip and easy mounting are essential




Convenient. Fast. Universal.


Save time and effort — automate your vacuum suction work with a battery-powered pump. Compatible, easy to install, and ready to use right after charging. An indispensable tool for professional workshops and everyday use.
